Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO SOCIAL SERVICES

Title: Requires any website or mobile application associated with an electronic benefit transfer system to be offered in the twelve most common non-English languages
Summary: Requires any website or mobile application associated with an electronic benefit transfer system to be offered in the twelve most common non-English languages.
LawCode: Amd ยง21-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring any website or mobile application associated with an electronic benefit transfer system to be offered in the twelve most common non-English languages
